data_description.forecast_entity: Power sensor from forecast.solar (e.g., Estimated power production - now). Used to expose forecast data as sensor attributes.

user.title: Add switch device
user.description: Configure a device to be scheduled based on energy prices and solar forecast.

data_description.switch_entity: Switch or input_boolean entity that controls the device.
data_description.power_sensor: Sensor entity that reports the current power consumption of the device in watts.
data_description.peak_usage: Peak power consumption of the device in watts.
data_description.daily_runtime: How many minutes the device should run each day.
data_description.deadline: Time by which the daily runtime must be completed.
data_description.priority: Scheduling priority (1 = highest, 10 = lowest). Higher priority devices are scheduled into cheaper slots first.
data_description.min_cycle_time: Minimum time in minutes the device must stay on or off before switching. Protects the device from rapid toggling. Set to 0 to disable.
